page.title: 16Family Life.
page.content: At the weekend our family usually goes their separate ways. I play football matches on Sundays and the rest of the time I go round my friends house. My Dad always has lots of jobs to do around the house or in the garden. My Mum stays in and does the housework and gets our dinner. My oldest sister spends a lot of time watching videos on the TV. But she also visits her friends house to play a lot. My brother is always round his friends house or has someone round our house to play. And my youngest sister is either sleeping or playing with her dolls. This isn't the same every weekend though. On the odd weekend we go on trips, all go to a friends house and sometimes we go to adventure parks, air shows and safari parks.
